content: During the first quarter, drilling and evaluation, DRE revenues of $292 million increased by $56 million or 24% year-over-year, largely due to higher demand for managed pressure drilling and wire-line services primarily in Latin America and the Middle East, north Africa and Asia. Production intervention PRI, revenues of $286 million increased by $27 million or 10% year-over-year due to higher demand for intervention, pressure pumping services, primarily in the Middle East, North Africa, Asia and Latin America respectively.
